Classical Storage¶

The Classical Storage object is a component of a Host used to store message objects.

class objects.classical_storage.ClassicalStorage¶

Bases: object

A classical storage for messages.

add_msg_to_storage(message)¶

Adds a message to the storage.

get_all()¶

Returns all Messages as a list.

get_all_from_sender(sender_id, delete=False)¶

Get all stored messages from a sender. If delete option is set, the returned messages are removed from the storage.

Parameters

  • sender_id (String) – The host id of the host.

  • delete (bool) – optional, True if returned messages should be removed from storage.

Returns

List of messages of the sender. If there are none, an empyt list is returned.

get_next_from_sender(sender_id)¶

Gets the next, unread, message from the sender. If there isn’t one, None is returned.

Parameters

sender_id (String) – The sender id of the message to get.

Returns

Message object, if such a message exists, or none.

remove_all_ack(from_sender=None)¶

Removes all ACK messages stored. If from sender is given, only ACKs from this sender are removed.

Parameters

from_sender (String) – Host id of the sender, whos ACKs should be delted.
